short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multisig extension wallet for Solana. Interact with Solana ecosystem with enterprise-level security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SquadsX acts as a companion tool to a Squads multisig and can be connected to various apps in the Solana ecosystem just like regular wallets, facilitating the creation of multisig transactions.

Interact with Solana, DeFi and its ecosystem without compromising the security of your assets. This extension offers enterprise-level security, ideal for teams looking to engage in on-chain activities such as liquidity provisioning, lending/borrowing, on-chain futures, and more. 

Squads is trusted by the biggest companies on Solana and helps secure over $600 million in value. SquadsX is built on the Squads v4 program, which has been audited three times by Trail of Bits, OtterSec, and Neodyme. 

SquadsX is still in beta and bugs or compatibility issues may occur, for that reason SquadsX is only available to Squads Pro subscribers upon release. We've collaborated with leading projects in the ecosystem to ensure compatibility.
